name: Tokyo Tattoo Girls / 刺青の国
description: Develop your companion's skills by giving her powerful tattoos and battle the Syndicate to escape the city in Tokyo Tattoo Girls!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core2 Duo 2.60 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Needs to support Shader Model 3.0 (DirectX 9.0c) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard
